brackets._label: $45,001 – $135,000: $4,288 plus 30 cents for each $1 over $45,000 (revised Stage 3)

medicareLevy._note: Medicare levy is 2% of taxable income. Individuals earning below $26,000 pay no levy. Between $26,001 and $32,500 the levy phases in at 10 cents per dollar above $26,000. Above $32,500 full 2% applies.

lito._note: Low Income Tax Offset: $700 max for income ≤ $37,500. Reduces by 5 cents per dollar from $37,501 to $45,000 (to $325). Then reduces by 1.5 cents per dollar from $45,001 to $66,667 (to $0).
